title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: fertility- partners of men who take antioxidants conceive more easily; Drug safety, product recall;... <!--more--> healthy cereals with blueberries- no berries, not healthy.
Morgellon’s Disease; fenugreek vs colds, flu symptoms.
Commentary: “The Media in America: Selling Views, Calling It News” (John Kozy 14Jan11 www.globalresearch.
com); The evolution of patriotism in America- from the founding fathers to the tea party radicals.
Allison Rose Levy is a journalist covering the health field; she is a former senior editor and producer of major network TV news & documentary films.
  More recently she was the co-host on VoiceAmerica’s Whole Person Healing & produced a 3 part series on Health and the Environment with the Safe Chemicals Initiative.
